title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase his identity as Spider-Man, but things go wrong.
actors: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch

title: Dune
synopsis: Paul Atreides, a gifted young man, must travel to the desert planet Arrakis to secure his family's future.
actors: Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Oscar Isaac

title: Thor: Ragnarok
synopsis: Thor must escape the alien planet Sakaar in time to save Asgard from Hela and the impending Ragnarok.
actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

title: No Time to Die
synopsis: James Bond comes out of retirement to take on a mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist.
actors: Daniel Craig, Léa Seydoux, Rami Malek

title: The Batman
synopsis: A reclusive Batman hunts down a serial killer targeting Gotham's elites, uncovering deeper corruption.
actors: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Paul Dano

title: Top Gun: Maverick
synopsis: Maverick trains a new generation of Top Gun pilots for a dangerous mission.
actors: Tom Cruise, Miles Teller, Jennifer Connelly

title: Eternals
synopsis: A group of ancient, immortal beings must reunite to protect Earth from a long-forgotten threat.
actors: Gemma Chan, Richard Madden, Angelina Jolie

title: Joker
synopsis: A troubled comedian spirals into insanity, becoming the infamous Joker in a chaotic Gotham City.
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz

title: Ant-Man
synopsis: Scott Lang, a thief, is recruited by Dr. Hank Pym to become Ant-Man and pull off a heist to save the world.
actors: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Evangeline Lilly

title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: The Avengers assemble for one final battle to undo the damage caused by Thanos and save the universe.
actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.
actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones

title: Titanic
synopsis: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given the task of planting an idea in someone's mind.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

title: Black Panther
synopsis: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.
actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista

title: Frozen
synopsis: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather.
actors: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Josh Gad

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: A meek hobbit and his companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
